decks.notes: The main focus of this deck is to quickly assemble the necessary resources to consistently lock opponents out of the game with a combination of fog effects and card draw. By utilizing cards like Moment's Peace and Weather the Storm to prevent attacks, while also drawing cards with Accumulated Knowledge and Brainstorm, this deck aims to outlast opponents and establish a strong advantage. The inclusion of bounce lands like Simic Growth Chamber and utility lands like Bojuka Bog provide additional support and flexibility, making this deck a formidable force in the Pauper 1 vs 1 format.

This Mono Blue Aggro deck focuses on quickly overwhelming opponents with low-cost creatures and spells in order to deal damage efficiently and relentlessly. By using cheap counter spells and card draw to control the pace of the game, while also utilizing powerful creatures like Cryptic Serpent and Delver of Secrets to apply pressure, this deck aims to win quickly and decisively before the opponent has a chance to mount a defense. With a focus on tempo and aggression, this deck is designed to outpace and outmaneuver opponents in a Pauper 1 vs 1 format.

The essence of this deck is to control the game through card advantage and removal spells while utilizing powerful creatures like Gurmag Angler to finish off the opponent. By combining counterspells, card draw, and efficient removal, this Dimir Control deck aims to disrupt the opponent's game plan and maintain control of the board. The deck also includes a mix of utility creatures and versatile spells to handle a variety of threats. The key strategy is to outvalue the opponent by efficiently managing resources and controlling the game flow.

The deck focuses on quickly deploying artifact creatures and utilizing sacrifice effects to deal damage to the opponent. It aims to overwhelm the opponent with a combination of efficient creatures, removal spells, and card draw. By utilizing the synergy between artifacts and sacrifice effects, the deck can quickly build a strong board presence and apply pressure to the opponent. The inclusion of removal spells and card draw provides the deck with the ability to maintain its aggression and adapt to different matchups.

The main focus of this deck is to create a fast and aggressive Orzhov Aggro strategy, utilizing low-cost creatures like Glint Hawk and Thraben Inspector to quickly apply pressure to the opponent. This is supported by removal spells like Cast Down and Deadly Dispute to deal with any threats the opponent may present. The deck also includes some recursion and card advantage options, such as Omen of the Dead and Refurbished Familiar, to maintain board presence and outvalue the opponent. Additionally, the mana base is carefully constructed to ensure consistency and smooth gameplay.
